mapper.sql: ID, info_ID, delivery_date, delivery_type, money, pay_date, pay_account, rmk
mapper.select:
select
distinct
'true' as QUERYID,
from wm_delivery_info
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into wm_delivery_info (ID, info_ID, delivery_date, delivery_type, money, pay_date, pay_account, rmk,delivery_sign) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{infoId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deliveryDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{deliveryType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{money,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{payDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{payAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rmk,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{deliverySign,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into wm_delivery_info
ID,
info_ID,
delivery_date,
delivery_type,
money,
pay_date,
pay_account,
rmk,

mapper.update:
update wm_delivery_info
ID = #{record.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
info_ID = #{record.infoId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
delivery_date = #{record.deliveryDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
delivery_type = #{record.deliveryType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
money = #{record.money,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
pay_date = #{record.payDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
pay_account = #{record.payAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
rmk = #{record.rmk,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update wm_delivery_info set ID = #{record.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, info_ID = #{record.infoId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, delivery_date = #{record.deliveryDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, delivery_type = #{record.deliveryType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, money = #{record.money,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, pay_date = #{record.payDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, pay_account = #{record.payAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, rmk = #{record.rmk,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update wm_delivery_info
info_ID = #{infoId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
delivery_date = #{deliveryDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
delivery_type = #{deliveryType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
money = #{money,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
pay_date = #{payDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
pay_account = #{payAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
rmk = #{rmk,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update wm_delivery_info set info_ID = #{infoId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, delivery_date = #{deliveryDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, delivery_type = #{deliveryType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, money = #{money,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, pay_date = #{payDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, pay_account = #{payAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, rmk = #{rmk,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
update wm_delivery_info set enable_="0" where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
SELECT a.id AS id, date_format(a.happen_date,'%Y-%m-%d' ) AS happenDate, Machine_model AS machineModel, part AS part, Num AS num, NAME AS name, fixed_telephone AS fixedTelephone, Mobile_phone AS mobilePhone, address AS address, express AS express, courier_number AS courierNumber, a.SN AS sn, parts AS parts, color AS color, appearance AS appearance, Bad_problems as badProblems, b.rmk AS rmk, b.delivery_type AS deliveryType, b.money AS money, date_format( b.delivery_Date,'%Y-%m-%d') AS deliveryDate, b.pay_account AS payAccount, b.delivery_sign AS deliverySign, b.rmk as rmk, c.fault_problem as faultProblem, c.repair_type as repairType, c.rmk as rmk2 from wm_order_info a left join wm_delivery_info b on a.id = b.info_id and b.enable_ = '1' left join wm_repair_info c on a.id = c.info_id and c.enable_ = '1' where a.enable_ = '1'
and date_format(a.happen_date,'%Y-%m-%d') = #{happenDate}
and a.name like concat('%', #{name}, '%')
and a.mobile_phone like concat('%', #{mobilePhone}, '%')
and a.courier_Number like concat('%', #{courierNumber}, '%')
and a.SN like concat('%', #{sn}, '%')
and a.address like concat('%', #{address}, '%')
order by happen_date desc, a.create_date desc

SELECT a.id AS infoId, date_format(a.happen_date,'%Y-%m-%d' ) AS happenDate, Machine_model AS machineModel, part AS part, Num AS num, NAME AS name, fixed_telephone AS fixedTelephone, Mobile_phone AS mobilePhone, address AS address, express AS express, courier_number AS courierNumber, a.SN AS sn, parts AS parts, color AS color, appearance AS appearance, Bad_problems as badProblems, b.rmk AS rmk, c.conf_key as weight, date_format( b.delivery_date,'%Y-%m-%d' ) AS deliveryDate, b.id as id, b.delivery_type AS deliveryType, b.money AS money, date_format( b.pay_date,'%Y-%m-%d') AS payDate, b.pay_account AS payAccount, b.delivery_sign AS deliverySign, d.fault_problem as faultProblem, d.repair_type as repairType, d.rmk as rmk2 from wm_order_info a left join wm_delivery_info b on a.id = b.info_id and b.enable_ = '1' left join wm_repair_info d on a.id = d.info_id and d.enable_ = '1' left join wm_config c on c.conf_name = a.Machine_model where a.enable_ = '1'
and date_format(a.happen_date,'%Y-%m-%d') = #{happenDate}
and a.name like concat('%', #{name}, '%')
and a.mobile_phone like concat('%', #{mobilePhone}, '%')
and a.courier_Number like concat('%', #{courierNumber}, '%')
and a.SN like concat('%', #{sn}, '%')
and date_format(b.delivery_date,'%Y-%m-%d') = #{deliveryDate}
and b.delivery_date is not null
and b.delivery_date is null
and a.machine_model like concat('%', #{machineModel}, '%')
order by a.happen_date desc ,a.create_date desc

SELECT a.id AS infoId, date_format(a.happen_date,'%Y-%m-%d' ) AS happenDate, Machine_model AS machineModel, part AS part, Num AS num, NAME AS name, fixed_telephone AS fixedTelephone, Mobile_phone AS mobilePhone, address AS address, express AS express, courier_number AS courierNumber, a.SN AS sn, parts AS parts, color AS color, appearance AS appearance, Bad_problems as badProblems, b.rmk AS rmk, b.id as id, b.fault_problem as faultProblem, b.repair_type as repairType, b.maintainer as maintainer, b.rmk as rmk2 from wm_order_info a left join wm_repair_info b on a.id = b.info_id and b.enable_ = '1' where a.enable_ = '1'
and a.name like concat('%', #{name}, '%')
and a.mobile_phone like concat('%', #{mobilePhone}, '%')
and a.courier_Number like concat('%', #{courierNumber}, '%')
order by a.happen_date desc ,a.create_date desc
